how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: Yes, and I am the only editor/administrator of my wiki(s)
putting it all together, what value does: Extensive use of TiddlyWiki in personal life, mainly for journalling, tracking activity and cataloging posessions. Strong use in work for knowledge sharing and instruction.
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I am comfortable writing filter expressions
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki through web browser with Download Saver (default saving mechanism)
as you selected diy, would be grateful f: I wrote a set of batch scripts to pick up listed files from Download folder, place in live locations and backing up files with date timestamp files that were already in live location with the same name.

what are we doing well? prompts for thin:
Looking forward to seeing what comes of project 2036 and achivements made on the path there. 
Hoping to get more out of Tiddlywiki by going through Grok again (my first attempt through v1 and my brain began glazing over after a point).
what could we do better? prompts for thi: Only real fear if support dries up and browser updates break key functionality of Tiddlywiki.
